original_text: And David said to Abishai and to all his servants, “Behold, my own son seeks my life; how much more now may this Benjaminite! Leave him alone, and let him curse, for the Lord has told him to.
korean_text: 또 다윗이 아비새와 모든 신하들에게 이르되 내 몸에서 난 아들도 내 생명을 해하려 하거든 하물며 이 베냐민 사람이랴 여호와께서 그에게 명령하신 것이니 그가 저주하게 버려두라

sentences.original_text: And David said to Abishai and to all his servants,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗이 아비새와 그의 모든 신하에게 말하되,

sentences.original_text: my own son seeks my life;
how much more now may this Benjaminite!
for the Lord has told him to.
